title.rendered: Princeton University Application Deadline for International Students 2024

content.rendered:
You do not have to miss your Princeton University Application Deadline especially for International students. In this page, you learn about Princeton University guidelines to admission application for international students. In addition, you will also learn about Princeton University Tuition, fees for International Students, Application Deadline for International Students.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
    • Application Fee:
    • Princeton University Acceptance Rate:
  • How to Obtain Application Fee Waivers?
  • Princeton University Graduate Application Checklist
  • Princeton University Login | Returning Applicant
    • How to login?
  • Princeton University List of Programs | Graduate Studies
  • Application Deadline
  • Princeton University Stores and Library
  • How to Access the Princeton university Stores

In this page, Princeton University Acceptance rate and the Princeton University Login page is provided.

Let’s get started.

Looking for where to study a Masters, Ph.D Program as an international Student? Princeton University application portal for admission into Princeton University, USA is open. To apply kindly follow the instructions on this page or visit Princeton University portal to apply.

The University do not accept late applications, and the application process is fully electronic. There is no spring admission, and graduate study at Princeton is offered on a full-time basis.

Application Fee:

The application fee is $70.

Princeton University Acceptance Rate:

Princeton University is one of the most selective universities in the United States, with a low acceptance rate. According to the data from the 2024 admission cycle, the acceptance rate for Princeton University was 4.4%. This means that out of 37,557 applications, only 1,652 applicants were admitted. Keep in mind that the acceptance rate varies from year to year and may be different for different programs or schools within the university.

How to Obtain Application Fee Waivers?

To get the application waiver fee for non-US citizen, follow the steps below;

  • Create an application account.
  • Complete the Fee Waiver Request page in the application.
  • Complete the Application for Fee Waiver page in the application and upload required material if applicable. To submit the request, click “Continue.”

Princeton University Graduate Application Checklist

  • Application Fee
  • Required Tests; GRE, GMAT, TOEFL, IELTS.
  • Statement of Academic Purpose
  • Resume / Curriculum Vitae
  • Letters of Recommendation
  • Transcripts
  • Fall Semester Grades
  • Statement of Financial Resources

How to Apply

  • Visit https://graduate-apply.princeton.edu/apply/
  • Create an account if you are first Timer
  • Login if returning Applicant
  • Upload all required documents
  • Track Application status

Princeton University Login | Returning Applicant

If you are returning applicant, to continue on the application process, you must login using the Princeton University login page.

How to login?

  • First visit https://graduate-apply.princeton.edu/apply/
  • Enter your Username and password
  • Click continue.

Princeton University Stores and Library

Looking for catalogues of research materials, Books, gift items, students care accessories and lots more, the Princeton University serves the purpose. It has remained resilient for the purpose of service the students and the interest of the University.

How to Access the Princeton university Stores

Access the stores by visiting https://www.pustore.com, create orders, manage orders and bookings, all in one place.
